eu_initiatives:
Magazines Ireland is following these files primarily through our colleagues at European Magazine Media Association: 
1. VAT rates 
2. Database Directive 
 
As well as working with EMMA on this file we also sent letters to Irish MEPs on our own behalf regarding this file -  
3. Copyright issues including the Publisher's Right
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
EMMA European Magazine Media Association 
FIPP International Federation of Periodical Press
goals__remit:
TO PROMOTE AND PROTECT THE INTERESTS OF IRISH MAGAZINE PUBLISHERS. 
 
Magazines Ireland worked closely with our colleagues at the European Magazine Media Association (EMMA)  to get support for a piece of draft legislation that could have significant benefits for press publishers: a Press Publisher’s Right (part of the EU copyright reform) that would give our members an important enforcement tool against unlicensed use of their valuable online content.
relevant_communication:
Magazines Ireland sent letters to 11 Irish MEPs in Brussels asking for their support on the revised EU Directive on copyright in the Digital Single Market. 
 
Magazines Ireland had a meeting with the Department of Enterprise in Dublin with Anne Coleman Dunne to lobby her support for the Directive.
